mention.text: Mexico 's governing party and the country 's corrupt judicial and legal system
the assassination last week of Mr Jose Francisco Ruiz Massieu , the party 's number two official
the ruling Institutional Revolutionary party -LRB- PRI -RRB-
the Gulf drug cartel in the state of Tamaulipas
Mr Rubio Canales , who reportedly blames Mr Ruiz Massieu for his conviction for fraud in 1992
